Message.Title: Poor Broke John Osborne Ebay's z50com And His Loser Sully Twins Think They Actually Have A Life.
Message.Msg: The poor Sullied trio (bet it's not 3 people) awake early every day, all day, day after day, year after year after year actually thinking their endless hate is accomplishing anything but getting customers to find out about the ongoing, untreatable, 12 year long board troll psychotic failure of ebay's z50com. That's ALL any of their posts will EVER accomplish. Poor babies. Professors know how to deal with unruly students. I hope that helps.

Message.Title: Poor Broke Lonely John Osborne, Ebay's z50com Keeps Jabbering Her Illness Publicly
Message.Msg: I keep offering the example to my students of what happens when an illiterate drop out doesn't even try in life, doesn't even try to save his neglected abused daughter or incredibly abandoned grand kid, doesn't even try to keep the wife from leaving and his ebay from failing, but ends up on a chat board of a stock he could never afford, bleating on a long ago poster he's g @ y ly obsessed over while he and his other IDs bothering who they can, yet never having any impact, except having his last few customers able to Google what a joke z50com is. I warn my students not to end up old useless drug head, and they laugh endless at the example, and post nasty to him when he taunts my name. John's 'entertainment' is literally eternal. Down below. Poor John thinks anyone cares and his other loser IDs keep wanting to see z50com flailed publicly. It works and works well for me. I hope that helps.

M, you should know by now that this is all John Osborne, ebays z50com, does, and has done for 12 years every day here: tell a lie, then bash the people who out him, so it looks like he has a few pals, but note it's always sully, sully bored or Flyktning. John has ran off anyone of intelligence. This is what she is and she abandoned and daughter and grand kid to do it. Pathetic cubed!

Sullied, Aside from the fact YOU are DRIBBLES, your ancient sullyinyour ma 2009 predicted no such thing. Once again, you got your many many IDs twisted. Pick a personality, and then off it for everyone's benefit.
